channel.title: (718) setting prices
channel.description: :) hi guys, i have already created a shop in unpackedshops.txt and already assigned it to an npc (smuggler). Now how do i changed the shop prices (im making this a dung store so i know how to change currency) ive looked for a wile now and i cant seem to find prices. please help, thanks :D

item.title: (718) setting prices
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

[quote=“KempiScape, post:2, topic:509848”]pricemanager.java

also don’t make the currency shit like fist of guthix tokens but just make it check for a int?[/quote]
thats what i was thinking, i want it so when the player kills the required npc without even picking up a drop they get so many points for killing that npc. Also thanks alot that realy helped me out ive been looking for 15 mins now LOL

Read full topic
